newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austrian Readymix unit to increase capital.
newsitem.headline: Austrian Readymix unit to increase capital.

text.p: Austria's Kies-Union, a unit of Britain's Readymix RMC Group Plc, will almost triple its base capital following a merger with Lieferbeton, another Readymix unit, the company said in a statement on Tuesday.

The equity capital would be increased to 152.5 million schillings from 57.8 million, Kies-Union said in an invitation for its November 29 annual shareholder's meeting published in the Wiener Zeitung daily on Tuesday.

Readymix last week said it would concentrate its Austrian activities by merging Kies-Union, the country's biggest supplier of sand and gravel, and Lieferbeton to form Readymix-Kies-Union AG. RMC will control 72 percent of the new firm. -- Vienna newsroom +431 53112 274
